function.name: iconv_get_encoding
function.description: Get internal encoding and output encoding for ob_iconv_handler().

function.name: iconv_mime_decode_headers
function.description: Decodes multiple MIME header fields at once.

function.name: iconv_set_encoding
function.description: Set current setting for character encoding conversion.

function.name: iconv_strlen
function.description: Returns the character count of a string.

function.name: iconv_strpos
function.description: Finds position of first occurrence of a needle within a haystack.

function.name: iconv_strrpos
function.description: Finds the last occurrence of a needle within the specified range of haystack.

function.name: iconv_substr
function.description: Cut out part of a string.

function.name: iconv
function.description: Returns str converted to the out_charset character set.

function.name: ob_iconv_handler
function.description: Returns str in output buffer converted to the iconv.output_encoding character set.
